title: Perma Ban
body:
I heard about bans that are "severe" that make you automatically get banned without the 3/3 punishments, and it happened to me but I don't think I was severely toxic.

Game 1
leighx: report ezreal
leighx: aatrox can you leash for me at blue?
leighx: lol im done
leighx: afking
leighx: AATROX LEASH MER
leighx: i dont have a leash??
leighx: nobody is salty buddy
leighx: you litteraly called everyone %%%gots
leighx: ez ban
leighx: yasuo can you give me a leash?
leighx: ..
leighx: yall have no jungle because aatrox wont leash me
leighx: ezreal talking so much that he is behind in cs xD
leighx: i would to if ur my adc
leighx: someone needs to leash me still
leighx: nobody has leash me yet
leighx: lol???
leighx: dude im playing a non meta champ i need a leash
leighx: ezreal stop because you're already getting banned for toxicity
leighx: im definitely reporting ezreal
leighx: you called them %%%gots and now you're flaming another player
leighx: nice job
leighx: we lost lol
leighx: ggwp.

When you read the part that says "%%%gots" remember that I was quoting an ezreal in my match. I didn't call anybody a %%%got.

replies.body:
If it turned into a perma, you either had a chat restriction recently or a 14 day ban. Saying hate speech usually only gives a 14 day ban unless it's extremely bad or a previous punishment was in place.

Don't quote hate speech, just report after the game.

As another has said, you can submit a support ticket and see if they'll do anything.
You can try submitting a support ticket and maybe they will reduce since it was repeating.  Don't repeat stupid.

The banhammer sadly does not care if you are quoting, especially if you had previous offenses bad enough to get you to a permban this fast. You _did_ flame your team, regardless of the language.

By itself that would definitely not warrant a ban.
